articles.title: Paul Reubens built Pee-wee’s Playhouse as the counterculture we need today - Polygon
articles.description: Paul Reubens, who died from cancer this week, created Pee-wee’s Playhouse and played Pee-wee Herman — and it’s the sort of campy counterculture we need today.
articles.content: The world of Pee-wees Playhouse was a realm of kinetic fantasies. A home where your imaginary friends might live. Claymation dinosaurs resided in the walls. All the furniture was alive and chatty. Th… [+6642 chars]
